item.title: Basic Cost Estimation
item.description: Systems read, transform and write data between components in the pursuit of business goals. Sounds simple! The choice of components however affect the overall cost of a system across a number of metrics. These metrics could be span performance (eg latencies, throughputs), health (error rates and availability), or even costs (plain $$s).
